classes.name: Bell  Bacterial

treatment.chemical: Consult local extension for appropriate treatment
treatment.cultural: Remove infected material, improve growing conditions
treatment.preventive: Use healthy planting material, practice good sanitation

classes.economic_impact: Can reduce yield by 10-30% if left untreated

treatment.preventive: Maintain good plant hygiene and proper growing conditions

classes.name: Early Blight
symptoms: Brown or black lesions on potato leaves

treatment.cultural: Remove infected plant debris, improve air circulation
treatment.preventive: Avoid overhead watering, plant resistant varieties

classes.name: Bacterial Spot

Spots may be brown, black, or yellow

treatment.preventive: Use pathogen-free seeds, practice crop rotation

classes.name: Tomato Yellowleaf Curl Virus
symptoms: Leaf curling or mottling on tomato
classes.causes: Viral infection, often spread by insects

treatment.chemical: No direct chemical treatment for viruses
treatment.cultural: Remove infected plants, control insect vectors
treatment.preventive: Use virus-resistant varieties, control aphids and whiteflies

classes.economic_impact: Can reduce yield by 10-30% if left untreated
